text: "Shine a Little Love" is a 1979 song by Electric Light Orchestra and is the opening track from their eighth studio album Discovery. It went to number 1 in Spain, number 4 in Canada and Ireland, number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 8 in the United States, number 9 in Norway, number 10 in the Netherlands, number 14 in Australia, number 16 in South Africa and number 17 in New Zealand. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Electric Light Orchestra songs
title: Shine a Little Love
